title: GET_PED_IN_VEHICLE_SEAT
content:
0x388FDE9A// GetPedInVehicleSeat
Entity GET_PED_IN_VEHICLE_SEAT(Vehicle vehicle, int seatIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.seatIndex: See eSeatPosition declared in IS_VEHICLE_SEAT_FREE.Returns: The ped in the specified seat of the passed vehicle. Returns 0 if the specified seat is not occupied.
codeBlocks:
// GetPedInVehicleSeat
Entity GET_PED_IN_VEHICLE_SEAT(Vehicle vehicle, int seatIndex);
